GSD.description:
xen/xenbus: don't let xenbus_grant_ring() remove grants in error case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.184 by commit 95ff82383266a7720d596eb8b4499ed01746a730. For more details please see the references link.
